name: LIGHT FLIGHT Luggage Sets, 3 Piece Durable Suitcase Set with Spinner Wheels, 3 Pcs Hardside Lightweight luggage with TSA Lock, Large Checked Travel Suitcases, 20/24/28 Inch, Rose Purple
short_description: Durable Construction: Crafted from high-quality ABS material, hard shell luggage sets offer exceptional durability while remaining lightweight. The textured surface not only enhances aesthetic appeal but also provides scratch resistance, ensuring luggage looks pristine after every journey. The 20 inch carry on luggage is airline approved and features a 25% expandable capacity, and the 24-inch and 28-inch suitcases are standard versions and do not offer an expandable feature. Capacity : 20" (42L, expandable), 24" (58L, non-expandable), 28"(80L, non-expandable)

Smooth Mobility: Experience effortless travel with premium 360-degree spinner wheels. Made with soft TPU and lubricated ball bearings, suitcases with wheels glide smoothly and silently, allowing for easy maneuverability in any direction. Designed for stability, the dual-wheel system ensures a steady roll, making 3 piece luggage set ideal for long trips or business travel. Enjoy a seamless journey, whether navigating crowded airports or bustling city streets

Ergonomic Handle: Suitcase set features a sturdy, adjustable telescoping handle that is ergonomically designed for comfort and ease of use. The handle locks securely in place, minimizing wobble during transit. Reinforced carry handles on the top and side provide additional convenience, while soft rubber grips protect your fingers when lifting. This carefully crafted design ensures that carrying a large suitcase is both confident and comfortable

Enhanced Security: Travel with peace of mind with hardshell luggage sets featuring a TSA-approved combination lock, which has a default code preset to 0-0-0. High-quality zippers are designed to resist punctures and ensure secure closure, safeguarding belongings throughout travel. With these security features in the 3-piece luggage sets, focus can remain on enjoying the journey, knowing valuables are well-protected

Organized Interior: The interior of this luggage set is designed for optimal organization. It includes a U-shaped zipper pocket, a large mesh pocket, and a small zippered pouch, making it easy to store and access travel essentials. Compression straps help prevent clothing from shifting, maximizing space utilization. Whether packing for a weekend getaway or an extended trip, this lightweight luggage—available in 20-inch, 24-inch and 28-inch sizes—ensures efficient organization, perfect for check-in luggage

Lifetime Support: Designed with durability in mind, our luggage sets come with reliable support for all essential components, including the shell, handles, wheels, locks, and zippers. Travel confidently knowing we’re here for you.

name: Kenneth Cole REACTION Diamond Tower Collection Lightweight Hardside Expandable 8-Wheel Spinner Travel Luggage, Deep Teal, 3-Piece Set (20", 24", & 28")
short_description: Durable hardside diamond-textured exteriors and fully lined, tear-resistant interiors.
Each piece expands an additional 2 inches for additional space when needed.
Premium 8-wheel multi-directional spinners on each piece allow for effortless free-weight maneuvering.
Main compartment interiors feature several zippered organization pockets, elastic shoe pockets, and garment restraint panels.
Each piece is equipped with a sturdy and user-friendly push-button retractable trolley handle that extends to be 41 inches.
product_description: They say diamonds are a girl’s best friend. If that’s the case, then the Diamond Tower luggage collection from designer Kenneth Cole is sure to be a girl-on-the-go’s best friend. The luggage collection features high-strength, hardside, diamond textured and diamond embossed ABS exteriors, along with fully-lined, tear resistant interiors. Its lightweight and spacious construction helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions and avoid unneeded airport fees, while its expandable zipper feature allows the bag to expand an additional 2” for extra carrying capacity. Multi-directional 8-wheel spinners allow for smooth, 360-degree movement over any rough surface for complete mobility free-weight rolling, relieving any pressure from your arms while on the move. The luggage also features molded corner guard reinforcements to help to absorb and deflecting shock for maximum impact resistance. When it comes to packing, Diamond Tower luggage is great for keeping your belongings organized. The fully-lined, main compartment interior features a large divider panel with a ventilated, mesh zipper pocket and buckles, along with a side hanging zipper pocket made to store smaller items. Under the lid, a large U-shaped zipper pocket allows for dual sided packing, a zippered mesh pocket, and elastic shoe pockets. Flexible top, side, and bottom grab handles on each piece allow for easier lifting, and molded side feet featured on the 28-inch size allow the suitcase to stand upright on its side. The sturdy locking retractable push-button telescopic trolley handle extends to be 41 inches tall, conductive for simple one-handed use. 20” luggage meets most U.S. based airline carry-on size requirements and fits into most airline overhead bin compartments. ★ 20” luggage overall dimensions: 22.0” H x 14.0” L x 9.0” – 11.0” D (includes top handle & wheels). ★ 20” luggage packing dimensions: 20.0” H x 13.5” L x 8.5” – 10.5” D. ★ 20” luggage weight: 6.8 lbs. ★ 24” overall dimensions: 27” H x 17” L x 11”-13” D (includes handle & wheels). ★ 24” luggage packing dimensions: 24” H x 16.5” L x 10.5” – 12.5” D. ★ 24” luggage weight: 8.65 lbs. ★ 28” overall dimensions: 30.0” H x 20.5” L x 12.0”-14.0” D (includes top handle & wheels). ★ 28” luggage packing dimensions: 28.0” H x 19.5” L x 11.5” – 13.5” D. ★ 28” luggage weight: 11.0 lbs.
